docs.text: Haishuo Wang School of Astronomy and Space Science Nanjing University 163 Xianlin Avenue, Nanjing, Jiangsu, 210023,China Email: wanghs@smail.nju.edu.cn Tel: +86 13547623135 ORCID: 0000-0002-7633-5363 Update Process Change the raw file '~/Desktop/hswang_website/hswang.github.io/docs/index.md' Open the terminal and get into '~/Desktop/hswang_website/hswang.github.io' shell cd ~/Desktop/hswang_website/hswang.github.io Build and Push it to Github repository ‘ Wallen-github / hswang.github.io ’ in the branch of 'gh-pages'. shell mkdocs gh-deploy If some following messages are output on screen, it means success and we can visit webpages by https://Wallen-github.github.io/hswang.github.io/ shell INFO - Cleaning site directory INFO - Building documentation to directory: /Users/hasson/Desktop/hswang_website/hswang.github.io/site INFO - Documentation built in 0.27 seconds INFO - Copying '/Users/hasson/Desktop/hswang_website/hswang.github.io/site' to 'gh-pages' branch and pushing to GitHub. INFO - Your documentation should shortly be available at: https://Wallen-github.github.io/hswang.github.io/ Note: It can take up to 20 minutes for changes to your site to publish after you push the changes to GitHub. If your don't see your changes reflected in your browser after an hour, see " About Jekyll build errors for GitHub Pages sites ." Commands mkdocs new [dir-name] - Create a new project. mkdocs serve - Start the live-reloading docs server. mkdocs build - Build the documentation site. mkdocs -h - Print help message and exit. Project layout mkdocs.yml # The configuration file. docs/ index.md # The documentation homepage. ... # Other markdown pages, images and other files.
